channel.title: How much bandwith dose rs07 use
channel.description: just as the title says i didnt know were to post this but yah please help i have 5 gigs a month ,how much would 1 hour use i use a verizon hot spot :S

item.title: How much bandwith dose rs07 use
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

i have a 20gig bandwidth and i go through it within a couple days…but that’s just because my isp are a bunch of niggers.

Read full topic

item.title: How much bandwith dose rs07 use
item.dc:creator: @latifundio latifundio
item.description:
@latifundio wrote:

[quote=“Cruel Truth, post:5, topic:507129”][quote author=latifundio link=topic=625355.msg4256981#msg4256981 date=1362937241]
1mb each time you load the client(loader 500kb?), then around 200 b/s on place with low players/npcs, the bandwidth raises a bit if there is a lot of them(ex. varrock on a trade world).

So i would say around 5mb per hour.
[/quote]did not know this :o[/quote]
lol i forgot i was browsing forums so it might be even less.

Read full topic
item.source: How much bandwith dose rs07 use

item.title: How much bandwith dose rs07 use
item.dc:creator: @Cruel_Truth Cruel Truth
item.description:
@Cruel_Truth wrote:

if you have wireless access use your home wifi. 5gb won’t be a lot though really. I mean I used to have a 2gb bandwidth and well that could get used up within like a day or so. You have to keep into consideration that the bandwidth will be used for images and etc.

Read full topic
